articles.title: Awareness That HPV Causes Cancer Is Ebbing Among Americans - U.S. News & World Report

articles.content:
By Cara Murez HealthDay Reporter
(HealthDay)
TUESDAY, April 18, 2023 (HealthDay News) -- The sexually transmitted human papillomavirus (HPV) can cause a range of cancers, but public awareness of th… [+3178 chars]
